prompts: Create a powerful electric-type Pokemon with striking yellow and black stripes.
Generate an energetic creature that embodies the spirit of lightning and speed.
Show me a Pokemon that has a bipedal stance, with a vibrant color palette and distinct features.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique, muscular build, perfect for electric attacks and agility.
Make a character that lives in urban areas and has a playful yet competitive personality.
Design a Pokemon that looks fierce but is actually friendly, with a striking electric theme.
Give me an electrifying Pokemon that appears in both forests and urban environments, showcasing its adaptability.
